nodes.text: Brashan was a governor of the planet Fedovoi End, a world occupied by the Yomo Council, a faction which parted from the Galactic Empire after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. In 5 ABY, the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, as part of the Imperial loyalists, was sent to devastate Fedovoi End. In a message to the world, Soran Keize, the commanding officer of the fighter wing, cited Brashan and General Tuluh as among the individuals he was going to erase from history during the 204th's attack. The 204th then proceeded to poison Fedovoi End and its population by opening up gas pockets in the planet's ice caps.
Brashan was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
